title: The Pop Group & Beyond (Mark Stewart, Rip Rig + Panic)
description:
The discography of post-punk band The Pop Group. After recording two masterpieces they disbanded, with vocalist embarking on a solo career backed by electro group Tackhead under the name The Maffia, continuing to blend dissonant electronic music with dub music as a stage for his political leanings. Guitarist/saxman Gareth Sager and drummer Bruce Smith forming a new band called Rip Rig + Panic with vocalist Neneh Cherry and pianist Mark Springer, a Pop Group regular. Rip Rig + Panic (later Float Up CP) emphasized frenzied dance rhythms and big band swing while fusing ethnic and punk music.
